mapper.select: select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_category as noticeCategory, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_content as noticeContent, filename, filepath, notice_date as noticeDate from notice order by notice_no desc

select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_category as noticeCategory, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_content as noticeContent, filename, filepath, notice_date as noticeDate from notice where notice_no=#{noticeNo}

select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_category as noticeCategory, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_content as noticeContent, filename, filepath, notice_date as noticeDate from (select rownum as rnum, m.* from (select * from notice order by notice_date desc) m) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select qna_no as qnaNo, qna_category as qnaCategory, qna_writer as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, filename, filepath, qna_date as qnaDate from qna order by qna_no desc
select qna_no as qnaNo, qna_category as qnaCategory, qna_writer as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, filename, filepath, qna_date as qnaDate from qna where qna_no=#{qnaNo}

select qna_no as qnaNo, qna_category as qnaCategory, qna_writer as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, filename, filepath, qna_date as qnaDate from (select rownum as rnum, m.* from (select * from qna order by qna_date desc) m) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
